title: Book a Spa Appointment
description: A hotel guest wants to book a 60-minute deep tissue massage at the hotel spa.

tasks.description: Check the spa's availability for a 60-minute deep tissue massage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds an open appointment slot for the desired time.

tasks.description: Book the appointment under the guest's name and room number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully reserves the spa appointment.

tasks.description: Confirm the appointment details with the guest and inform them the charge will be posted to their room folio.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear confirmation of the booking.
